CustomField.description: The date and time the adjustment was made. If you are using the Persist Adjustments Across Versions option on the active revenue forecast setup record, on future versions this shows the original adjustment date and time.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date and time the adjustment was made. If you are using the Persist Adjustments Across Versions option on the active revenue forecast setup record, on future versions this shows the original adjustment date and time.
CustomField.label: Adjustment Date
